title: Stop using bullshit chargers to troubleshoot boards!
message:
If you are trying to power on a 13" machine, use a 60w charger or higher.

If you are trying to power on a 15" or 17" machine, use an 85w charger.

Realize that knockoff chargers that claim 85w are usually 60w chargers rebranded. If you look in the operating system in about this mac, you can see if the OS sees a 60w or an 85w charger.

If SMC_ADAPTER_EN is not 3.3v, either you have an SMC related problem or you are using a fake charger.

Just buy an original charger. You paid for a rework setup, you paid to set up your business, spend the $50 or so to get a charger that you can trust for testing.
